name: GPTWOL
description: GPTWOL is a simple and lightweight Wake on Lan GUI made with python to wake up your computers on your LAN.

paths.name: Config
paths.description: If you migrate from an earlier version, just move the old computer.txt to the new location

variables.name: WebUI Port
variables.description: Free Port on your host system. The default is 5000

variables.name: Disable Editing
variables.description: Change this value to 1 to disable the ability to add or delete computers. The default is 0 to allow it

variables.name: Ping Frequency
variables.description: Frequency of ping status checks. Can be 15 or 60 (seconds). The default value is 30 seconds

variables.name: Ping Timeout
variables.description: Change the time to wait for a ping answer in ms. The default value is 300 milliseconds
